QuestData.Title: Stasis Chambers of the Mana-Tombs
QuestData.Description: The Mark of the Nexus-King that you recovered has allowed me to forge a new key for the stasis chambers found inside the Mana-Tombs.$B$BAccording to the glyphs on the mark, two exist: one near the front and one near Nexus-Prince Shaffar. This key that I am about to give you will open the stasis chamber near the front.$B$BI want you to go to the Mana-Tombs of Auchindoun and open the Mana-Tombs Stasis Chamber.
QuestData.LogDescription: The Image of Commander Ameer at Bash'ir's Landing in the Blade's Edge Mountains wants you to use the Mana-Tombs Stasis Chamber Key on the Stasis Chamber inside the Mana-Tombs of Auchindoun.$B$BThis quest may only be completed on Heroic difficulty.
QuestData.CompletionText: I would understand if you chose not to continue, $N.
QuestData.RewardText: Word has gotten back of your heroics, $n. Haramad and I both agree that what you've done deserves a great reward.$b$bThough... Nevermind, you've done enough. I cannot in good conscience ask anything more from you.
